art_style: Draw in classic Disney style with modern and sophisticated elements. Focus on large expressive eyes, smooth skin, and soft facial features for the character. The background should be a bright, contemporary college campus with detailed and vibrant surroundings.
content: Create an image of an Asian person looking thoughtful and slightly worried, standing on a vibrant, colorful, and detailed modern college campus. The character should appear concerned about making new friends in a new environment. The background should include college buildings, trees, and groups of students interacting.
